alert.note: Alert for Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 11 at 3:55PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Flagler and southeastern St. Johns Counties through 430 PM EST... At 355 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pomona Park, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Palm Coast, Andalusia, Marineland, Crescent Beach, Butler Beach, Espanola and Dupont Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns
